sourcesContent:
import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions' const OrderScreen = () => { const { id:orderId } = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails); const {order, error, loading } = orderDetails; if(!loading && !error){ order.itemsPrice = order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) } useEffect(() => { if(!order || order._id !== Number(orderId)){ dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)); } },[order,orderId,dispatch]); return (loading?( ): error ? ( {error} ):(

Order : {order._id}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name}

Email: {order.user.email}

Shipping: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? Order is empty : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items: ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${order.shippingPrice} Tax: ${order.taxPrice} Total: ${order.totalPrice}
)); } export default OrderScreen
